option(PLUGIN_SAMPLE_EDITOR_PLUGIN "Build SamplePlugin" OFF)
if (NOT PLUGIN_SAMPLE_EDITOR_PLUGIN)
	return()
endif()

#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

start_sources()
# -- SamplePlugin.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"SampleAssetEditor.cpp"
		"SampleAssetEditor.h"
		"SampleAssetType.cpp"
		"SampleAssetType.h"
		"SamplePlugin.cpp"
		"SamplePlugin.h"
		"StdAfx.h"
		"StdAfx.cpp"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

CryEditorPlugin(SamplePlugin PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "Sandbox/Plugins")
